31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Imran b. Hussain said:A man who had no other property emancipated six slaves of his at the time of the death. When the Prophet (ﷺ) was informed about it, he spoke severely of him. He then called them, divided them into three sections, cast lots among them, and emancipated two and kept four in slavery

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ أَعْتَقَ عَبِيدًا لَهُ لَمْ يَبْلُغْهُمُ الثُّلُثُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Manumits Slaves Of His That Exceed One Third Of His Property
